LanguageData.CSGingerbreadDoor.label: Gingerbread door
LanguageData.CSGingerbreadDoor.description: Divides rooms. Gingerbread doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.
LanguageData.CSGingerbreadWall.label: Gingerbread wall
LanguageData.CSGingerbreadWall.description: An impassable wall made of gingerbread. Capable of holding up a roof.
